It also reduces the player's Attack, Strength and Defence. In the Dragon Slayer I quest, it is one of the items used on the door in the Dwarven Mine.

Item ID1907

The wizard's mind bomb, also known as WMB, is an ale that temporarily boosts a player's Magic level (by +2, or +3 if level 50+ Magic), and restores 1 Hitpoints. It also reduces the player's Attack, Strength and Defence. In the Dragon Slayer I quest, it is one of the items used on the door in the Dwarven Mine.

It can be brewed by the player or bought from The Toad and Chicken, Sam or Rachael in the Burthorpe Games Room, or Jossik's The Lighthouse Store for 2 coins or at the Rising Sun Inn for 3 coins.

According to the book Gielinor's flora - hops, its taste has been compared to warm tap water with a lot of fizz.

Contents

  • 1 Effects
  • 2 Creation
  • 3 Instructions
  • 4 Shop locations

Effects[edit | edit source]

  • Restores 1 Hitpoint
  • Temporary skill boost in Magic by ⌊ M a g i c L e v e l × 0.02 ⌋ + 2 {\displaystyle \lfloor MagicLevel\times 0.02\rfloor +2} (totaling +2 if level 1-49, or +3 if 50+)
  • Temporarily decreases Attack, Strength, and Defence by floor(Level * 0.05) + 1

Instructions[edit | edit source]

Steps
1. Use 2 bucket of water on the fermenting vat
2. Use 2 barley malt on the fermenting vat
3. Optional: Use 1 the stuff on the fermenting vat, increasing the chance to mature the ale from 5% to 36%
4. Use 4 yanillian hops on the fermenting vat
5. Use 1 ale yeast on the fermenting vat
6. Wait 1–5 days until the beer has fermented
7. Use 8 beer glasses on the completed ale in the fermenting vat

[[File:Wizard's mind bomb detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''wizard's mind bomb''', also known as '''WMB''', is an [[ale]] that temporarily [[boost]]s a player's [[Magic]] level (by +2, or +3 if level 50+ Magic), and restores 1 [[Hitpoints]]. It also reduces the player's [[Attack]], [[Strength]] and [[Defence]]. In the [[Dragon Slayer I]] [[quest]], it is one of the items used on the door in the [[Dwarven Mine]].

It can be brewed by the player or bought from [[The Toad and Chicken]], [[Sam (barmaid)|Sam]] or [[Rachael]] in the [[Burthorpe Games Room]], or [[Jossik]]'s [[The Lighthouse Store]] for {{NoCoins|2}} coins or at the [[Rising Sun Inn]] for {{NoCoins|3}} coins.

According to the book [[Gielinor's flora - hops]], its taste has been compared to warm tap water with a lot of fizz.
==Effects==
* Restores 1 [[Hitpoints|Hitpoint]]
* [[Temporary skill boost]] in [[Magic]] by <math>\lfloor MagicLevel \times 0.02\rfloor + 2</math> (totaling +2 if level 1-49, or +3 if 50+)
* Temporarily decreases [[Attack]], [[Strength]], and [[Defence]] by floor(Level * 0.05) + 1
